data.meanings: To lie, say what is not a fact, lie to falsely invent, tell lies about or against, fabricate a lie, relate a lie, say a falsehood, be wrong, be cut off, deceive, disappoint the expectation of.
data.sentence: The word فَكَذَّبَ comes from the root ك ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: To lie, say what is not a fact, lie to falsely invent, tell lies about or against, fabricate a lie, relate a lie, say a falsehood, be wrong, be cut off, deceive, disappoint the expectation of.

data.meanings: to rebel, disobey, oppose, resist, transgress.
data.sentence: The word وَعَصَى comes from the root ع ص ي and is associated with the meanings: to rebel, disobey, oppose, resist, transgress.
